titleStmt.title: Funerals made cordials: in a sermon prepared and (in part) preached at the solemn interment of the corps of the Right Honorable Robert Rich, heire apparent to the Earldom of Warwick. (Who aged 23. died Febr. 16. at Whitehall, and was honorably buried March 5. 1657. at Felsted in Essex.) By John Gauden, D.D. of Bocking in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.C. for Andrew Crook, and are to be sold at the Green Dragon in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Green Dragon in St. Pauls Church-yard
